posts.content:
thesickness wrote:Nice one! Many would have chucked the towel in and bought a t5 or something (probably me included) Good luck on your new adventures!
Thanks, can't say I wasn't tempted by getting something like a T4 2.5 TDi California, but I knew I would still have the desire to be back in a split again!
